DOC.brief_title: Salpingectomy Cesarean Delivery Ovarian Cancer Reduction ( SCORE )
DOC.detailed_description: All pregnant woman receive prenatal care within UAB Health System , plan undergo tubal ligation time schedule cesarean delivery ( primary repeat ) approach study . Patients randomize receive either standard tubal ligation practice institution ( modify Pomeroy procedure Parkland ) complete salpingectomy . The objective trial evaluate complete salpingectomy perform safely comparable standard postpartum tubal ligation .
